resources:
JellyTiger Data Error
Server Address Server Address[:Port] Connect Server Operating System Product Name Local Address Username Password Sign In> Quick Connect Recommended Jellyfin version is v%s, the minimum supported Jellyfin version is v%s.
Unknown Error Failed to acquire a secure connection. Failed to reach the server. Failed to find system information from server. The product name in the Jellyfin system information is incorrect. Failed to find Jellyfin version in system information. The SDK JellyTiger used uses a newer version of the API compared to the server. The SDK JellyTiger used doesn\'t support this Jellyfin version of the server. The system information response was slow.
